trans-unit.source: Provides an image adapter class for the XHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XHTML 配接器集的影像配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: The control adapters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace provide XHTML rendering and processing for mobile controls on a variety of display devices.
trans-unit.target: 中的控制項配接器<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>命名空間提供 XHTML 轉譯和處理上各種不同顯示裝置的行動控制項。

trans-unit.source: for verifying at load time that the class derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" /> has this permission.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的載入時間驗證<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter" />具有此權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlImageAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlImageAdapter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 取得關聯控制項的強型別 (Strongly Typed) 參考。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Renders the control and its content on the client using the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />，在用戶端上呈現控制項和其內容。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the image control on the client using the provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter" /> 物件，在用戶端呈現影像控制項 。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。
